title: E-Learning Design Thinking Workshop for Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general understanding of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Capacity-Building Program for Developing E-Learning Content Combining Language Domains (Including Environmental Terminology) and Sustainability

learning_goals: Learners can connect and explain core concepts related to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) through language activities.
Learners can create e-learning activity prototypes reflecting the needs of target audiences using the design thinking process.
Learners can plan and implement interactive e-learning content using digital tools (Mentimeter, Miro, etc.).

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER) related to SDGs

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
